### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.facebook.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com) ### Comment > Suggested pages, Reels, People You May Know, etc., are no longer reliably blocked on www.facebook.com. Tried switching from mobile website to desktop websitein Safari settings, but that only makes it worse. This has been intermittent for about 4 days now. When these posts are actually blocked, scrolling this website becomes jittery. Username: `@MinisterOfOffense` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://everywebsiteayleastonsafari.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Feverywebsiteayleastonsafari.com) ### Comment > DNS blocking seems to completely block all websites on safari from loading. comment.body:
`||components2.gazzettaobjects.it/rcs_tealium/v1/distro/gazzetta/prod/utag.js`
fixes the second one.
No problem with AG Tracking Protection enabled because of `||components2.*.it/rcs_tealium/` rule.

As concern the first one, I can't reproduce it with this filter lists configuration. Btw, I guess AdGuard Tracking Protection is disabled because of `License type: free`. 
```
gazzetta.it##+js(aeld, adblockActivated)
||gazzettaobjects.it/rcs_anti-adblocker/$3p
```
(from uBlock filters – Ads) fixes it.

comment.body:
Кроме того, рекомендуется установить AdGuard Extra.

---

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: kick out screen capture JavaScript
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

I've never seen a refusal to get such an operation situation, and it's equivalent to a declaration that a **virus** that captures screen in ms without any consent.

### Proposed solution

I feel the need to stop JavaScript to get cursor operations on the web page with filter.

### Additional information

In the electronic version of the Mainichi Shimbun, there was an article called "[Challenge to God: Aim at users with AI advertising, Japanese corporation representative of Apia Group](https://mainichi.jp/articles/20231015/k00/00m/040/073000c)" In this article, Koji Tachibana, the representative of Japan of the Apia Group, made a surprising statement.

>  You can determine how far you scrolled to the product page and the degree of interest in the product by the speed of scrolling. If you are interested in the product, you will read the product description carefully, so the scrolling will be slower. If you are interested, you can also trace around the product image with the cursor. Switching browser tabs is also an important element of knowing the level of interest.

I've never seen a refusal to get such an operation situation, and it's equivalent to a declaration that a **virus** that captures screen in ms without any consent.

That's kinda strange, because the tag is not `text`.
Anyway, I'd prefer the ext-css rule as it more accurate and do not interfere with its design.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

@EastExpert The issue is caused by `Frellwit's Swedish Filter`, please disable this filter or add `@@||bstatic.com/static/affiliate$stylesheet,domain=hotels.opodo.co.uk` to the user rules.
